Texts.Chs: 在^orange;改造台^reset;处制造^orange;激光采矿器^reset;然后返回。
Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Mining Laser^reset; at a ^orange;Tinkering Table^reset; and return.

Texts.Chs: 我听说过一些奇妙的东西，但我最想在我死之前看到一把^orange;采矿激光^reset;。麻烦你在^orange;改造台^reset;帮我做一个。记得^orange;研究^reset;^orange;工程^reset;科学。
Texts.Eng: I've heard of some fancy stuff in my day, but I'd most like ta see me a ^orange;Mining Laser^reset; 'afore I die. I heard you kin make one in a ^orange;Tinkering Table^reset;. That's ^orange;Researched^reset; in the ^orange;Engineering^reset; sciences.

Texts.Chs: 你今天让一个星之子很开心。非常感谢，朋友。作为感谢，拿上我找到的这块不寻常的石头。它看起来很值钱。
Texts.Eng: You've made an ol' Novakid happy today. Thanks so much, friend. Take this unusual stone I found as a thanks. It looks valuable.
